duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and assist with various roles such as cashier, restaurant server, kitchen lead, cook, prep cook, and drive-thru cashier.
Participate in paid training to become a productive member of the restaurant team.
Work all shifts including opening, closing, and everything in between to support the operation of the restaurant.
Earn up to an extra dollar fifty per hour through additional training, certifications, and performance evaluations within the first year of working.
Maintain a clean and organized restaurant environment, take orders, process payments efficiently, and follow proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Demonstrate teamwork, responsibility, dependability, authenticity, and pride in delivering excellent service.
Adhere to company policies, work under pressure, and take initiative to ensure continuity of service.

education_certification.credential: No education or certification requirements for entry-level position
